channel.title: How do I make Veng require 45 defence?
channel.description:
Hey I've almost finished my Server and it's looking pretty neat, Only one problem left. (Well two but this is my biggest)
How do I make it so that Vengeance requires 45 defence to use? ATM 1 Defence Pures can use it and it looks messy.
Also if anyone could tell me how to change how long Barrage freezes for that'ld be great. I know it's got something to do with the FreezeTimer but all I see is a '1' next to it and not like, 30 seconds for example.

item.title: How do I make Veng require 45 defence?
item.dc:creator: @Controlkill Controlkill
item.description:
@Controlkill wrote:

Hey I’ve almost finished my Server and it’s looking pretty neat, Only one problem left. (Well two but this is my biggest)

ATM 1 Defence Pures can use it and it looks messy.

Also if anyone could tell me how to change how long Barrage freezes for that’ld be great. I know it’s got something to do with the FreezeTimer but all I see is a ‘1’ next to it and not like, 30 seconds for example.
